Name: Note
Description: You see a small crumbled up note. On it is written "I have hidden a key in the cupboard. Make your way out of here!".

Name: Corkscrew
Description: A one-time use corkscrew for opening bottles.

Name: Bottle of wine
Description: A bottle of exquisite wine, unfortunately not to your taste.

Name: Opened wine bottle
Description: An opened bottle of wine. Not to your taste, but could be used to wash something.

Name: Small key
Description: A small key with ample rust on it. Should still work.

Name: Pickaxe
Description: A sturdy pickaxe looking capable of clearing boulders.

Name: Purple key
Description: A beautiful purple key with a triangle engraving.

Name: Crowbar
Description: A sturdy crowbar, useful for removing planks.

Name: Key fragment
Description: One half of what seems to be a beautiful purple key.

Name: Second key fragment
Description: One half of what seems to be a beautiful purple key.

Name: Lump of dirt
Description: A lump of dirt. There seems to be something inside it.
